title: Urology
description:
The vision of the Urology Fellowship Handbook was to create a book aimed at candidates sitting for the urology fellowship exam that efficiently covers every aspect of clinical urology in a comprehensive yet concise format. The secondary aim was to produce an invaluable resource for students, urological nurses, and consultants alike who wish to have a thorough resource of urology at the tip of their fingers.

There is no longer a need to search multiple books, internet sites or guidelines – this app is designed to address all aspects of clinical urology in a modern, dot point, up to date and comprehensive manner. The information in the book will be updated on a regular basis. The app also contains an extensive library of relevant clinical urological videos.

Features

• Download all sections, or only select sections that you are interested in
• Powerful search
• Articles with interactive images, illustrations, and videos
• Bookmark relevant topics
• Get to know the authors of each chapter of the book
